title: Responds to name and maintains eye contact
description: Child turns toward their name and maintains brief eye contact during interactions.

activities.title: Name Game
instructions: Sit face-to-face and softly call your child's name.
When they look, smile and respond warmly.

activities.title: Peek & Call
instructions: Hide and say their name.
When they look, reveal your face and smile.

title: Understands simple 1-step directions
description: Child follows simple directions like 'give it to me' or 'come here'.

activities.title: Bring Me Game
instructions: Place two items.
Say 'Bring me the ball' and gesture.

activities.title: Clean-up Song
instructions: Sing a simple clean-up song while pointing and modeling.

title: Uses 5–10 meaningful words
description: Child uses a small set of words consistently to label people/objects/actions.

activities.title: Label & Point
instructions: Point to a photo and label (e.g., 'Grandma').
Pause to allow child to imitate.

activities.title: Snack Choices
instructions: Offer two options and label them clearly.
Wait for an attempt to say the word.

title: Learns everyday categories (foods, animals, toys)
description: Child expands knowledge of common words across everyday categories.

activities.title: Toy Sort & Label
instructions: Sort toys into groups and label each group.

activities.title: Picture Book Hunt
instructions: Find and name all animals/foods in the book.

indicators: Can name items in common categories

title: Recognizes rhyming words
description: Child notices words that rhyme at the end of words.

activities.title: Rhyme Match
instructions: Match picture pairs that rhyme (cat/hat).

activities.title: Silly Rhymes
instructions: Make silly rhyme pairs and laugh together.

title: Handles books and attends to pictures/print
description: Child enjoys shared reading and shows book-handling skills.

activities.title: Book Time Routine
instructions: Create a daily cozy book time.

activities.title: Picture Walk
instructions: Describe pictures; ask simple what/where questions.

title: Takes short conversational turns
description: Child can take 2–3 turns in simple back-and-forth exchanges.

activities.title: Question Ball
instructions: Roll ball and ask a simple question; wait for answer; take turns.

activities.title: Emotion Talk
instructions: Name feelings during play; invite responses.

title: Uses 2–3 word phrases
description: Child combines words to make short phrases (e.g., 'more juice', 'daddy go').

activities.title: Model + Pause
instructions: Model two-word phrases; pause to elicit imitation.

activities.title: Play Scripts
instructions: Act out simple scripts and model phrases.

title: Understands who/what/where questions
description: Child answers simple WH- questions in familiar contexts.

activities.title: WH Hunt
instructions: Ask who/what/where questions while reading.

activities.title: Treasure Where?
instructions: Hide a toy and ask where; prompt to answer.

title: Uses descriptive words (big/small, colors)
description: Child uses basic adjectives to describe objects.

activities.title: Describe & Find
instructions: Describe an object; child finds it (e.g., 'Find the big red car').

activities.title: Opposites Play
instructions: Act out opposites (fast/slow) and label.
